issues.description:
In the function `ClaimBlessings()` the following predictable state variables are used to determine Ether recipient:
- block.timestamp
issues.title: Dependence on predictable environment variable

issues.description:
In the function `ClaimBlessings()` a non-zero amount of Ether is sent to an address taken from storage slot 2.
There is a check on storage index 2. This storage slot can be written to by calling the function `ExtendLife()`.

There is a check on storage index 2. This storage slot can be written to by calling the function `ExtendLife()`.
There is a check on storage index 0. This storage slot can be written to by calling the function `ExtendLife()`.
issues.title: Ether send

issues.description: A possible transaction order independence vulnerability exists in function ClaimBlessings(). The value or direction of the call statement is determined from a tainted storage location
issues.title: Transaction order dependence

issues.description:
A possible integer overflow exists in the function `ExtendLife()`.
The addition or multiplication may result in a value higher than the maximum representable integer.
issues.title: Integer Overflow
